name: Mark Technology Limited
description: NoWait is our flagship all-in-one platform that empowers businesses to seamlessly engage customers, distribute encrypted digital coupons, and complete secure payments—all within a single WhatsApp conversation. NoWait’s patented technology integrates FPS payments directly into WhatsApp, enabling a seamless customer journey from inquiry, digital coupon distribution, and online payment to offline verification and receipt printing via POS devices. This all-in-one solution boosts efficiency, ensures secure transactions, and delivers a smooth digital shopping experience with high ROI and return rates
